scripts.assert-no-rx: ! npm ls rx rxjs --only=prod | grep rx
scripts.test-all: npm run assert-no-rx && npm run test-rx-latest && npm run test-rx-rxjs && npm run test-rxjs-latest && npm run test-missing-deps
scripts.test-missing-deps: npm run babel && npm run clean-rxjs && npm run clean-rx && gulp test-missing-deps
scripts.test-rx-latest: npm run babel && npm run clean-rxjs && npm run install-rx && gulp test
scripts.test-rxjs-latest: npm run babel && npm run clean-rx && npm run install-rxjs && gulp test
scripts.test-rx-rxjs: npm run babel && npm run install-rx && npm run install-rxjs && gulp test
